website_summaries.verdict: Not your Grandma’s mop and bucket.
pros: Perfect for those who are convinced you need a bucket to truly wash a floor – no bending over required!
Gets behind toilets, and around and under furniture in a way that microfiber mops can’t
Press a foot peddle to wring mop each time you put it in water
Washable, triangular mop head that's perfect for corners
cons: Bucket is too large to fit into most kitchen sinks to fill

website_summaries.verdict: It's easy to use, does the job, and is reasonably sturdy.
pros: Feels sturdy and is very durable
Size and weight allows for easy use
cons: The head flops around, and plastic sometimes scrapes the floor

website_summaries.verdict: One of the most highly rated microfiber mops on the market, this astounding product can meet all your cleaning needs.
pros: Includes a no-splash bucket that allows for hands-free wringing
Splash guard keeps splash and spray inside bucket
The foot-press spinner allows customers to control the mop's dampness
cons: Customers wish the mop was lighter
Bucket is not equipped with wheels

website_summaries.verdict: A value-packed mop and bucket combo that's especially well-loved for its convenient foot pedal wringing system. Ideal as a starter set or if you already have a microfiber mop.
pros: Mop bucket features a foot pedal spinner for hassle-free wringing that doesn’t require any bending or pushing
Offers precise control over how wet or dry your mop is
Splash guard helps prevent accidental messes
Comes with a microfiber mop that easily reaches into corners and under furniture
cons: The mop itself could be a little sturdier, but it can easily be replaced with a similar model

customer_reviews.title: Really small. You can’t return it.
customer_reviews.text: That thing looks like a toy. The pictures they show are really deceiving. Check the pictures and see how small it is. It will take you hours if you try to clean a decent size room. The worst thing is you can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Z.

customer_reviews.title: NOT a Strong product.....
customer_reviews.text: It broke right out of the box, during first use. We filled the bucket, dunked the mop, starting mopping and crack. Broken pole attachment. Really a flimsy pole, and the locking mechanism to set the length of the mop is poor as well. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Granata

customer_reviews.title: OCD Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so ever since finding this mop on Amazon, I've been excited to try it. In a market of sub-par household cleaning devices, this thing ROCKS! I love this mop so much, I mopped my whole house twice in a row. This mop picks up everything off the floor. Even pebbles that can be left on the floor in corners and pet hair. This mop picks up everything! The wringer is PERFECT. I do a two step process where I first start by getting the floor sopping wet, then I go back through with the mop as dry as I can get it. My floors are completely dry in about 5 minutes. LOVE LOVE LOVE! Please buy this mop!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon B.

customer_reviews.title: I really feel like I got took on this purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is not well made. The handle is supposed to screw together but it falls apart while I am using it. The handle is short, even when extended as far as it will go. I really feel like I got took on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mcginnis

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept, but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. The first one, the foot pedal broke. This one the bucket is leaking. I really like the concept of how works, not that they don't last that long. My last bucket was purchased in February, lasted just two months. The return date was in March. Hope this helps someone else.
customer_reviews.author: koolnani

customer_reviews.title: A must to own
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say I HATE washing the floor with a regular mop. However, this is FANTASTIC, not only does it do a great job, the floors (both wood, and tiles) look great. Have been raving about this product since I first used it. No more do I hate washing floors, no more wringing out mop heads by hand ugh, this is wonderful. Put the mop head in spinner, spin it dry and just mop. No way could there be an easier and efficient way to clean my floors. Thanks o-cedar!
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: If I could make it "minus" stars I would. It has not even been 30 days and the handle will no longer lock when you extend it. It makes it horrible on your back to try and mop and I am short. This is a lot of $$ for a product that is so poorly made. It is too much trouble to pack up a bucket and mop to return, so I will not. Awful!
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: I will not recommend this product at all
customer_reviews.text: Takes time to squeeze the water from the mop. We have to push the pedal for 50 times. After get washed in the dryer the microfiber mop was all damaged. I will not recommend this product at all. Very dissatisfied. I saw this product and bought it from a cleaning video of a well known you tuber using this and suggested this product. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: NARENDRAN RAMALINGOM

customer_reviews.title: O-Cedar nailed it this time!!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought a mop could change my life! This mop cuts a least a half hour off my cleaning time and since I can ring it out so well it does a fabulous job on my hardwood floors without worrying about puddles of water which could do damage! The triangular design is great for corners too! I also like how I can toss the head in the washing machine to clean it. I would highly recommend this mop!
customer_reviews.author: kheiser67

customer_reviews.title: I just want a mope that looks like Shakira.
customer_reviews.text: There is something that you need to be aware of before moping whit this bad boy. You can ONLY mope in some specific degrees, If you go lower you could scratch the floor with the plastic. So yeah, you need to have a very specific technique, and me the guy who mope like a crazy person and wants to mope in every possible direction/inclination while listening to Adele just can’t understand that. I put this mope and bucket in the trash almost brand-new after a few months of trying; I realized that I had to stop trying to make this work, she will never come back and this mope will never work properly. I deserve better.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hard floors
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop and bucket. We have pergo floors that aren't 100% waterproof; however, the spin bucket is able to remove so much water from the mop head that I'm able to easily clean and disinfect the floors without worrying about water soaking into the joints of the boards. I also love that the mop heads are washable. I've purchased several mops in the past, and it gets super frustrating when you need a new mop head and they just don't exist at the store anymore. Sponges and non washable heads get really gross after just a few uses. Would totally recommend this mop system to others.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Horrible mop and handle bucket good.STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money ,I bought this product because I use the hurricane spin mop at my Inlaws house and loved it so I figured o cedar brand had to be better plus they sell them everywhere you go so I picked one up what a mistake Ocedar should be ashamed to put their name on this product very disappointing.im only giving it 1 star because the bucket is ok.The handle keeps collapsing ,the mop head keeps falling off ,when the mop part gets wet its hard to get back in the spinner part STAY AWAY.
customer_reviews.author: Raz

customer_reviews.title: Cuts my cleaning time in half!
customer_reviews.text: I love my O Cedar mopping system! I'm an avid mopper, having hard wood floors throughout my home. This mop and bucket have made mopping so easy. The bucket is lightweight but holds plenty of water. The wringing component is perfect! It allows me to have a dryer mop for hardwoods and a wet mop for bathrooms, etc.... You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Girls

customer_reviews.title: Great mop and bucket system!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the mop today and have mopped two rooms!!! So far I like it.. Still trying to figure out how to extend the handle!! Overall I love the mop and bucket
customer_reviews.author: Nene

customer_reviews.title: The handle broke after 5 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke after 5 months of use. Used this mop once a week for the past 5 months, and was happy. Last weekend the handle came apart; a plastic piece that connects the top part to the bottom part of the handle broke in half.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Payne

customer_reviews.title: No returns allowed.
customer_reviews.text: No returns allowed and it wasn’t what I was expecting. Very disappointed even tho it says prime.
customer_reviews.author: Natashia

customer_reviews.title: My first One Star review
customer_reviews.text: Received this product today 1. The mop handle will not stay locked but collapses with pressure against the floor 2. The red plastic section under the mop scratches the floor. 3. The bucket leaks where the screws are under the bucket. Note the foot pedal is recessed under the bucket so as not to be seen but felt by the user. Dangerous except for the very agile.. This is my first review of less than three stars out of the hundreds of products I have ordered from Amazon. It only gets one star because my cat likes the shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Used about 6 times and then the pedal broke off. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela N

customer_reviews.title: Get a generic version of this if you can!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was easy to use but I have a lot of ceramic & hardwood floors. I use different cleaners on them. So, I think for $40.00 you should get 2 mop heads. One for each. Second it was hard for me to mop & carry this thing around. I would have liked wheels. I looked back at the other purchased items & I see lysol & other mop heads. How bout wheels? How many people order Lysol from Amazon? Anyway..... I would not purchase again. I’ve seen generic versions & I would think they are just as good if not better.
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: Actually Worked!
customer_reviews.text: I actually had low expectations because I haven't liked any of the other three mops I tried. I am really pleased with the EasyWring Spin Mop. It's not too small and not too big and sloppy. The spinning really does work and it doesn't spray out from the spinning well either. I like how the mop head is triangle so I can get in the corners. Micro fiber does hold dirt instead of smearing it like my Shark brand steam mop or my sponge mop. Five spins worked great for mopping and the 10 or 15 spins at the end really got a lot of moisture out. I never had to touch the mop head.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten A. Arbo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible mop
customer_reviews.text: I got this mop for my mom based on the stellar reviews for this product, She had used similar mops in the past, and had usually had only good experiences with them, however she was very unhappy with this mop and bucket set. It doesn't squeeze out the water properly, even when you pump the peddle 10 times, it's still completely wet, I'm not sure how this product has so many good reviews, as this is a very crappy product. She even spoke to O-Cedar customer service, and they advised her to return it back to Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Best Mop & Bucket !
customer_reviews.text: I have tried at least 6 different types of mops & buckets. My house keeper recommended this OCedar model (COVID-19 Keeping her home) . WOW was she right about how well it cleans. It is very easy to use, no stress on my arthritic shoulders. The mop heads are a soft microfiber which picks up everything very efficiently. I actually enjoyed mopping!! Highly recommend this for quality, effeciency and good price includes extra mop heads. I like to change the heads when I empty the bucket for fresh water. With marble floors all sandy dirt is picked up. Mop heads go right into the washing machine!
customer_reviews.author: Phala Pesano

customer_reviews.title: Whats the point?
customer_reviews.text: This is complete junk! It is like sticking your mop into a salad spinner. It might shake off a little water but not enough to mop without drenching the floors. I tried to return it but apparently it is ineligible for returns. Now I'm stuck with another useless cleaning product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best mop ever!
customer_reviews.text: I do not like to mop my tile floors but with this mop, it is a much nicer experience. I just had my tile floors professionally cleaned and sealed and did not want the grout to get dirty again. I read that using a sponge mop was the best way to get the grout dirty again, so I started looking for a better mop. I think I have found it with this mop. It wrings out easily, gets into corners, and doesn't leave water in the grout lines. I like the fact that I can wash the head after using so that when I mop again, I have a clean mop. Highly recommend and it's made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $30
customer_reviews.text: THis mop is awful. The “pivoting” head is better described as a flop over head. This thing doesn’t glide over the floor at all, the way it is shown in the product video. They must have used a dry mop in the video. I’ll go get an old school string mop at the hardware store and use the bucket to wring it.
customer_reviews.author: The siege

customer_reviews.title: I'll never use another mop again....
customer_reviews.text: The mop to end all mops. Seriously. Look no further and order this mop. It makes it so easy to efficiently mop your floors. The microfiber mop heads easily pick up dirt and scrub the floor with minimal elbow grease. The mop heads ability to go into the washing machine is great as well! The threads are short so they won't get tangled in your machine. Finally, if you have laminate floors this mop is safe for use because the easy wring action of the mop bucket allows you to ensure the mop is not soaking wet when you go to mop.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McKe

customer_reviews.title: Think before you buy
customer_reviews.text: If you are no taller than 5-6, it might work, but, Im 6-0 and this thing will break your back. Second, the mop head is tiny requiring you to do only very small areas and taking much longer. It became a question of which came first, a bad backache or a loss of any enthusiasm to continue. In addition, the mop head is very very small, making cleaning take much longer. The spinning basket is ok for removing water, but it doesnt work for removing any kind of dirt other than loose dirt pieces. Hair remains
customer_reviews.author: gradyman

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1 year
customer_reviews.text: We have about 2000 sf of porcelain tile and change out 4 mop heads each cleaning day. This mop is used once every 2 weeks, for just over a year. I just calculated, it's been used 30 times. The handle just broke. So while the house cleaner and I love this mop, I'm disappointed the handle doesn't stand up to average or below-average use. Am I expecting too much for 5-10 years of use? Maybe it's warrantied but such a pain to deal with for a measly handle. I try to recycle and not toss unnecessarily in to landfills, I will jerry-rig it somehow...
customer_reviews.author: M. T-B

customer_reviews.title: What a bummer!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed! The mop is too heavy when wet compared to the smart mops and the spinner does a very poor job of wringing out the water no matter how long you spin it. So you end up having to wring it out by hand anyway. I got the thing so I wouldn't have to do that! The mop is too small also. For that price and compared to O Cedar's other products it is a failure. I will have to go to the trouble of sending it back or just give it away.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to clean up anything!
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use - but don’t let that be the positive thing that sells you on this product. It’s cheap and the “wringing” function just doesn’t work very well. It’s not efficient and it takes way too long to clean up anything. I hate this mop & wasn’t even going to leave a review until it popped up when I searched Amazon for a floor mop again. I really wouldn’t trust any of these positive reviews. I don’t leave bad reviews often, & this mop is a real waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Reidhead

customer_reviews.title: Salad spinner meets mop. laffin! 2 spins is ...
customer_reviews.text: A salad spinner and a mop had a baby! I found that it's easier to pop the mop head off the handle by hand rather than pulling up on the handle while stepping on the mop head as demonstrated. 1-2 spins is wet enough for tile/stone floors, 3-4 spins is dryer for laminate and engineered wood floors. I use fresh water and cleaner for each room. The only concern I have is that I fear that the handle attachment on the bucket is going to fail one day, so I tend to underfill the bucket to keep it lighter. I sure wish O Cedar would consider using a metal handle on the bucket. I would be happy to pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Ryerson

customer_reviews.title: BEST MOP/BUCKET SET PERIOD
customer_reviews.text: I have been disabled for years. I cannot use heavy mops which you bend to wring out. I have tried all the mops you can purchase that twist, bend or supposedly self wring..none of them lasted. I mop my home at least 1x a week. I absolutely loved this so much that I purchased refill mop heads and told Sister and friends to buy one. WE ALL LOVE IT! BEST THING EVER. EASY TO USE, LIGHTWEIGHT, THE FOOT PEDAL IS STRONG, MOP HEADS WASH UP EASILY. I use a clean head for upstairs and a used wash one for my cement basement floor. Works like a charm! 100% LOVE IT! Thanks O Cedar & Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your Name Is Important
customer_reviews.text: Hey it's me CharlieT, as you know I have to be honest about the products I buy; because people needs to know. I had my O-Cedar EasyWring Microfiber Spin Mop, Bucket Floor Cleaning System. It was working well, but the foot part if the bucket broke for no reason. I only had a chance to use it twice and then it stop. I was excited when I received it but wasn't feeling well enough to use it. O-Cedar HOW CAN THIS BE YOU HAVE ALWAYS HAD A GREAT REPUTATION.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie T

customer_reviews.title: I can't beleive I've gone back to a mop
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a Swiffer wet jet fan, seems to always leave a film on any flooring except ceramic tile. I used with a couple of different floor cleaners, store bought and home made and all worked well, the floors were really clean in about half the time of a Swiffer and a lot less money. Then I used with Method floor cleaner and turned out to be the perfect combination on all floors. Throw in washing machine and comes out beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: C. B. Turner

customer_reviews.title: This mop is life changing.
customer_reviews.text: When my 10year old Swiffer mop finally croaked, I wanted to find something else completely as I'm no longer a fan of buying products that keep you stuck with their proprietary cleaning solutions. Plus it was leaving streaks all over my high shine wood floors. I hadn't wanted a mop, because traditional mops require a fair bit of wringing to not leave the floors so damp that they leave water marks once dry. This little microfiber mop does a heck of a job and my floors are streak free! My only complaint is that I wish the handle was longer, fully extended, I still have to bend over a fair bit to use elbow grease on areas that need it.
customer_reviews.author: MrsRuh

customer_reviews.title: Saved me in a Skunk Cleanup
customer_reviews.text: This came in handy when my dog and a skunk had a standoff requiring me to intervene. It was a nightmare- not to mention how mere droplets of skunk gland oil can contaminate an entire 2 story home inch by inch when they run through the house afterwards. For the floors- If I hadn’t had this set me- I would have been in a world of hurt. Took me 10 hours to clean walls, clothes, dog & my own hair. Thankfully this bucket mop system helped me tremendously by me avoid touching the oil & recontaminating the floors. I just poured a separate bucket of water on mop then spin and emptied the bucket outside.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Waste of your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: Cons: -Handle would not locking at the top (manufacture defect) -The mop does not get wrung out and stays very wet -Not eligible for return -Flimsy Pros: -None
customer_reviews.author: Kenway

customer_reviews.title: It’s kind of fun
customer_reviews.text: Ok this might be weird to say, but this mop combo was actually fun to use. The step-on mechanism to spin the mop ringer section was sadly the most fun I had all day (thanks quarantine). I may have spun it several more times than necessary just to play around a bit. My nephew thought I was going bonkers. Maybe. But I’ll bet you’ll think that part of it is cool too. One negative is that it wasn’t great for getting anything off that was slightly stuck on, so I still had to use a little extra attention in those spots. If there was a small scrubby side for that purpose, it would be even better.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the O'Cedar Easy Wring!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, where has this been all my life! LOVE this mop/bucket combo. The bucket has a nice narrow profile which makes it easy to store in my work closet but still holds a good amount of water and has a nice sturdy handle. The microfiber mop head fits well into the spinner and you are able to control the moisture of the mop with a few pumps on the pedal. Mop does a fine job of cleaning tile floor, gets into all corners. Only thing that could make this even better would be to have wheels on the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: d redling

customer_reviews.title: Flopped Mop
customer_reviews.text: I have now received my 2nd Spin Mop & Cleaning System because the handle didn't work on the first one.. It is a telescoping handle that is supposed to "lock" in 2 places when extended. The first one only locked in one location so Amazon refunded as the item is not returnable. The second mop handle does not lock in either of the 2 places, so unless you are 3 feet tall it is impossible to use. I just hung up with Amazon and they are refunding the 2nd purchase. In addition filed a complaint directly on the O'Cedar website and am awaiting a reply. I think this product looks good but it needs a handle!!!
customer_reviews.author: onlineshopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice sqeaky clean floors!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this to scrub the top of my car because the microfiber is so gentle and gets the grime off. It works well! I finally used it today in our new home that has stained concrete floors downstairs. What I love about it is that the bucket size is perfect and the head of the mop is triangle so you can get the corners so easily. The mop reminds me of my salad spinner. It does such a great job wringing the water out my stepping on the peddle. Very pleased with this product. It makes mopping the floors not so bad after all.
customer_reviews.author: LaineTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 6 months ago and have used it maybe twice a month at the very most. Well it broke today while I was mopping, the plastic piece inside the handle close to the base broke apart inside and now when I try to pick it up, the mop just falls off the bottom and I’m left holding the stick... this is a disappointment considering I really enjoyed using it when I did and it was very convenient but I haven’t even had it for a full half a year and it’s already broke with minimal usage...
customer_reviews.author: leahcrave

customer_reviews.title: Good but maybe not from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Both my mom and sister have this mop. One bought from Costco, one from Walmart. I bought on here out of convenience. The mop stick comes small and extends but mine has a hard time staying extended as the last piece won't twist completely tight. Also the mop head was defective and the fabric was all clumped together. My mom gave me one of her replacement heads and it was perfect. I love the mop itself but would recommend not buying on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Update****The stick does NOT extend it extended!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to this product, bucket & spinning device is great B U T the mop stick it self is tiny. For like a 5 year old. My back ached and I had to mop in a sort of squat position very uncomfortable! I am 5’5” and exhausted at the end. I hope the seller reads this and sends me an actual stick that extends for an adult. Update!* I told my husband that the stick would not extend and he twisted it and extended it. I guess it just needed more strength. I was afraid to break it. Now giving it 5 stars bc it really is great!
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but too small
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for mopping small areas because it is kind of small. The amount of water the bucket can hold and the mop head are both pretty small. But it is very easy to use especially you don’t have to put much efforts in draining water from the mop. Just a couple steps on the paddle the mop is already very dry, which is great compare to other mop set. It works great for my 700 sq ft apartment, and I only have about 500-550 sq ft of wood floor to mop.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: The mop works fine if used lightly. The spinning strainer does pretty good job taking off excess liquid from the mop. It is definitely not meant to use for deep cleaning because the extremely thin mop rug cant handle tough stains. The rod is very short so long cleaning with this thing could potentially cause back pain. The bucket takes more space than it looks, dimensionally and visually. so before buying it, make sure have room to hide it.
customer_reviews.author: JTanQ

customer_reviews.title: JUST WOW
customer_reviews.text: I bought the off brand version of this at Aldi for like 1/2 the price. But it was leaky and heavy and just not that good. I finally decided to just get this original one that I wanted in the first place. Not that its a splurge by any means but it SO worth the money. Its so lightweight yet sturdy, does the job so well, and just easy to use. I HATE mopping and it was always such a hassle that I dreaded, but not anymore. This mop makes it a lot more enjoyable for sure! Don't think twice just BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Roman Grigorenko

customer_reviews.title: it doesn
customer_reviews.text: i used to buy this product but this time the handle was defect, also spin did not work well, mop was still wet after couple times spinning, the foot pedal was loosen while pedalling and need to get back track again, but mop head was still wet... not sure what went wrong with quality of the product. on top of the handle used to be spinningable, this time was fixed... also not sure if mop head was ordered not from O-Cedar that mop head was longer than the past ones we ordered...
customer_reviews.author: EQ Holdings LLC

customer_reviews.title: Best mop I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: So really this mop is worth the hype. I’m actually really picky when it comes to mops. I’ve been looking for a quality mop for at least 10 years and everything I’ve tried has fallen short. The mop itself is constructed very well (though the handle could be about a foot longer), and the mop head is perfectly designed. Good material. Cleans well without streaking. I use this on hardwood and laminate. Narrow enough to fit tight spaces. The wringer is a rock star though. Great design. Removes all excess water so you have the perfect amount for cleaning. My search is over. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Riecker

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but no replacement handle
customer_reviews.text: Really really enjoyed this purchase for a couple months! Alas the extendable mop has one very fragile screw fitting that broke shortly thereafter, and there's no way to replace the worn out end or the mop, so it looks like I'd have to buy an entirely new system to replace it, or get another brand of mop to use with this really nice bucket & discard the couple extra mop heads I have ready. This is really a tragic waste, and either really poorly planned, or very maliciously planned. Very sad that this nice unit is now so useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fowle

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: There’s not really anything positive I would say about this other than it’s a good size bucket. The mop head comes apart as soon as you use it and it’s very flimsy. I think you can find the same quality at the dollar store. The bucket does have a pedal on the side that can rotate the little water basket to drain out the water from the mop head. This feature was cool it worked but again the mop head itself is low quality. This would probably be good for someone who has a starter home a small home or apartment. Although the bucket is pretty big so make sure you have a storage space for it.
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: Great for crevice and corner problem areas my other mops miss.
customer_reviews.text: Better than the other "self wringing" mops, the angular head gets corners CLEAN for once without undo effort, and some problem crevices behind my standing desk. It IS a small mop head, but this pays dividends for getting into hard to reach areas around furniture feet. This is not one of the large swab-the-boat-decks type mops, I have had no trouble with the mop pole, but I haven't have to exert much force with it yet. I live in Florida where the humidity means I really need to have a dry mop for the final pass, and this works super well!
customer_reviews.author: L. Easterly

customer_reviews.title: The WORST EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I brought a brand new cedar Mop set and the stick does not even lock. I wasted almost $40 on this product. You guys really disappointed me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not spin the water out
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try this product and I thought it would make my cleaning easier, but when I tried it on hardwood floors I realized that the mop was too wet. When I touched the mop, after repeated spinning, it was still full of water. I could squeeze a lot more water with my hand. So what is the purpose of spin bucket when it doesn't do the job? I wish I could return it. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: K W

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our hardwood and laminate floors. Our claimed to have a water-proof layer but we still wanted to play it safe with a mop. We bought this and the spinning feauture is amazing. I played with it a few times to get that perfect amount of moisture I was comfortable with for both cleaning power and quickness to dry. The material itself was great at picking up the few stains we had on the floor. My kids loved spinning it and encouraged them to want to help with chores as it made it fun. The bucket is a perfect size, not too big and not to small and easy to dump.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Mop
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this mop! I found the link to this on Go Clean Co's Instagram and have read so many rave reviews! Now I'm a believer. For year's I've used a Swiffer (and more recently a reusable one) and now realize that my floors were never really clean. The day before this mop arrived, I cleaned my floors as I normally would. Then, I used this mop with hot water and powdered Tide detergent and was horrified at how dirty my floors were! The water was GROSS! I had to mop the floors two times to get all the junk and dirt up. Anyway, buy this mop. It's legit.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Smith

customer_reviews.title: I can finally mop my floors again!
customer_reviews.text: I immediately ordered this mop and bucket when a friend raved about it saying it takes very little effort and you never even have to touch the mop head! I have arthritis in my hands and back along with fibromyalgia so it’s been extremely difficult to do much deep cleaning other than “swiffering” and I feel like that doesn’t get my floors as clean as actual mopping. This one’s a winner! Mop head is gentle on my hard woods and detaches to be cleaned in the washing machine. It can be completely replaced when it wears out! I mopped my whole house with no pain and was extremely pleased with the results! Definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lena P

customer_reviews.title: Good, but guess plastic parts don't hold up
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Have had two years and bucket will not wring anymore. Guess the plastic doesn't hold up past a couple of years. In today's world, things don't last like we'd like them to. I guess $30. every two years isn't awful..just a little bummed when I find out I can't buy the bucket only and that I'm in the middle of house cleaning and it doesn't work. All in all, it is still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to it's name
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what I expected I purchased to give my back a break and stop bending over However the mechanism that is supposed to "wring" out excessive water does not even work like at all. So it's completely & utterly useless and I still have to use my old mop to actually go over and dry the floor
customer_reviews.author: Tressajames

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mop and bucket solution for the home
customer_reviews.text: After watching a few videos of various spin mop products I purchased the O-Cedar EasyWring Microfiber Spin Mob. I have been very pleased with its performance and have recommended it to my friends and neighbors. Initially I was a little concerned about the spinner being made of plastic but it has worked out fine and is durable as well as lightweight. I find the mop design to work very well at getting into the corners and the removable microfiber heads stay on and pickup the liquid very well. The spinner is very easy to use and works very well at wringing out the mop.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mattar

customer_reviews.title: This Is the One!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mop! Cleans beautifully and gets into every corner, nook and cranny. The spinner is the thing I love the most about it. It’s genius! Excellent quality. The only slightly negative thing I can say, is that some caution needs to be taken while mopping to ensure that the plastic part of the head is sufficiently covered with the microfiber or else it will drag on hardwood floors. It almost did that the first time I used it, but I learned to avoid that and it’s been smooth sailing since then. Buy this mop and never look back!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great mop!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mop and bucket. I had one a few years ago and gave it away when I moved and it’s just as great as it was back then. I was worried about buying it online since I seen one reviewer said it was small but it’s actually the perfect size. Easy to put together and cleans really well. I tried to take pictures to show the size of the mop. I’m 5’4 and it’s a good length for me. It gets into places I haven’t been able to get too and clean. If you are looking for something easy to use this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Must have mop ! ( Both Hard wood and Tiles )
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several types of mops and Buying the re-fills for wet mop for many years now. The O-Cedar one is the best. Even if you pay for this product, you do not need to keep on buying the refills. That is straight saving money. Especially foot pedal that spins the mop, very easy to use. The bucket and mop handle seem sturdy and well made. After using this product I am suggesting this to so many friends. I've been using this cleaning product for a week now and have had no issues at all with it. I bought a second one to gift my sister and hope she likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Deepthi Ganti

customer_reviews.title: Good, Not Great For A Reason
customer_reviews.text: The mop and bucket are easy to use. The mop rinsing is easy and exactly as described, which is great. The biggest problem is the mop head itself is way too small. Especially when the mop head is wet, it really gets even smaller. When using the mop, you can actually scratch the floor because the mop head is just not big enough to move around unless holding the mop at the exact angel. You can hear the bottom of the mops stick scratching/touching the floor. It mops fine, but the mop head really should be twice the size. If they could fix that or have refills with bigger mop heads this would be a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis M.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done great!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write great reviews but I am impressed with this mop. Not only did it do a great job on the bathroom floors, the shower walls, and hardwoods, but it cleaned the baseboards too! They look awesome with little to no effort! Come on, people. How many times have you looked at your baseboards and thought 'yuck'......too lazy to clean. Now you can hit it with the mop when you clean the floors and be done with it. I bought two extra mop heads, and two of the extra red mop head holders so I can keep them apart for certain cleaners. I love this mop. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: L. Strine

customer_reviews.title: You really gotta step in it to get the water out of the mop
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a mop that would eliminate me manually wringing it out and decided to try the O-Cedar. What a lot of reviewers have said is true that the mop tends to be very wet. You gotta really step on the lever a good 4-5 times to get most of the water out of the mop. I also think the actual mop is very tiny and covers a small surface area. My husband isn’t very thrilled about that. Also, make sure you store the mop stick downwards if you’re leaving it outside to dry. Any water collected inside it can be a nightmare to get out.
customer_reviews.author: G&G

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life?!? I bought three. Omg I love this!!! I hated mops my whole life. Always dragging water, stinky, hard to dry water. This is the holy grail of mops! I have OCD trust me! One I use it daily. You do not need a lot of water! Makes my floors sparkle. For deep cleaning I legit wash my floors with this! Only complaint... wish it had two separate compartments in the bucket... one for dirty water one for clean. For example, where you dry to spin it, should be separate from the clean water! (Hint, hint :) ) but other then that I love this mop with all my heart lol
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It's doesn't rinse well with the spin system - IT'S STILL A MANUAL MOP
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product thinking I wanted a touch free mopping system. This is not touch fee. One still has to take the mop end and squeeze it dry, otherwise it has too much water. I've had other spin systems that actually squeeze the Mop Head with the spin mop, oppose to just spinning out water alone, and no squeeze. I like the product however, it's good quality. You have the option to remove the mop head, and wash it separately in the washing machine. I would buy it again. Perhaps their next version actually squeezes the mop.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Tina

customer_reviews.title: Does What It's Supposed To - Kinda
customer_reviews.text: The bucket part is all put together. It doesn't have wheels, so it can be difficult to move around as you are mopping. The mop itself is okay. It doesn't have a lot of surface value when wet, but it works. The spinner function is okay. If you have filled the bucket more than a couple inches, there can be some problems with keeping your mop in the spinner and the water beneath it. I have one of these 10 years ago that was of much higher quality. I wish I had kept it when I moved.
customer_reviews.author: Theaterdreamer

customer_reviews.title: Cinderella Wishes...
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever dreaded mopping your floors? Overwhelmed with how to clean a mess without a mess? Hate the poor cleaning experience of swifter wet jets and whatever? Dread the mess and stink of a real mop? Me too. Get this. It can quickly and easily be broken down to be stored away. The mop head is washable. Throw it in with your rugs!!! The spin feature is perfection and lets you decide how much water you need — I want to mop my floors. Seriously. This just makes it easy to keep hardwood floors in a 1400sq ft apartment, with two dogs, neat and clean. Stores away in the utility closet. HIGHLY recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept, buy it on sale...
customer_reviews.text: 3 1/2 stars for nice concept. It does really make cleaning floors easier with the spin function. However, the cost cutting is apparent with everything being plastic with some parts less robust than others. If you buy it on sale as I did and it doesn't last that long then that's how consumerism works in this country today. One obvious improvement I can see would be to split the main bucket into two so the dirty water from the spin chamber can drain into that. Overall, I'd recommend it on sale price, way better than traditional mops or using disposable products like wet swiffers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Speegee

customer_reviews.title: Love this mop!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great for corners and under furniture too. My house is a mix of hardwood, laminate, and tile floors and this worked easily on all surfaces. For the first use I tried it without sweeping. I have a puppy so there were paw prints, little bits of chewed up toys, and plenty of dog hair. All clean in a snap!! The microfiber mop head is really really microfiber-sticky so it is great for cleaning surfaces but do be careful what it goes in the laundry with -- it picked up all the lint from a bathmat! No problem overall, just a caution.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Saw this mop setup on GoCleanCo IG and decided to give it a try. Mops are usually just mops and usually have something irritating. This mop is life changing. The head is easy on/easy off. It's a snap to toss in the washer after use and air dry. The head is thick enough that you don't feel like you're scraping the floor. The spinner actually spins the water out so you can keeps your hands clean and dry. Because you don't touch the mop head you can use super hot water and bleach as needed with no worries sanitizing. I would 100% purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for the feint of heart
customer_reviews.text: This is a decently constructed pr product It is in my opinion a product that works better for younger people a a you need to have good stamina to "pump" The pedal mechanism that makes it spin...senior citizens might have a problem in this area.The bucket I s not divided into 2 area's...so after you wring the dirty water mixes with the clean water in bucket So dumping and putting clean water in the bucket is a chore...NOW THE PRICE IS GREAT AND YOUR NOT IN ANY WAY FEEBLE IT'A GOOD BUCKET.?
customer_reviews.author: stephano

customer_reviews.title: I don't have to touch the wet mop head anymore
customer_reviews.text: I like how the strainer spins to remove excess water. The foot pedal is easy to reach and use. The front of the bucket makes pouring out the used water easy and helps prevent spills. The mop head can be removed and tossed into the washing machine to get it clean, and replacement heads are available to purchase. The only downside is that the bucket is too large to fit in my sink, so I must use the sprayer to fill it up. That isn't a big deal, and I don't think it takes anything away from the product, but you might want to know ahead of time that it is a big bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie from GA

customer_reviews.title: Clean Floors!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so excited about a piece of cleaning equipment! I am not missing being on my hands & knees and after doing a side by side of the mop vs my hands & knees method I am a supporter of this product! The food pedal is a bonus added fun to the whole process! I have a new puppy and that means mopping at least once a week, if not more so this was just so necessary and made it much easier and quick! The price and quality is beyond what I could find at any big box store. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Minneapplemuffin

customer_reviews.title: WHY DIDN'T I BUY IT A LONG TIME AGO?!
customer_reviews.text: Best mop I have ever owned, no joke. I have had two steam mops that broke within a year prior to this one and they also left those annoying marks on the floor. This one LEAVES NO STREAKS!!! This mop has a head you can pop off to wash, adjustable handle that work for taller people like myself (or shorter people like my 5 year old). Super easy side to side mopping. No splashing. No bending over. No moving electrical cords. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 for the deep cleaning part just because nothing deep cleans better than good ol fashioned hands and needs washing. Other than that, this thing is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: BLauer

customer_reviews.title: Very Frustrating but updated
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mop and did everything it said it would except after only less than 2 months of use once a week the pedal to spin the mop broke off. It's plastic so there isn't much I can do to fix it. I would like to talk to the manufacturer for a replacement part. I don't think they even sell just the bucket or parts. P.S. contacted seller, distributor and manufacturer. No response... And you still can't buy parts or jut the bucket. After being convinced to try this product again I can say I have used it with great satisfaction even though I never got any response from the supplier or manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Nanas House

customer_reviews.title: No more hands in dirty water
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd bucket we've purchased. The first one my daughter bought for herself. It works beautifully. You can easily fill the bucket, add your floor cleaner and use it. Your hands never touch the dirty mop or water. It's easy to handle as long as you don't over fill it. It stores in a broom closet, and the mop heads are machine washable. They're available at the home improvement stores for about $7.50, but you won't have to replace it for quite some time. I really love using this product to do a job I really hate doing.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Busy

customer_reviews.title: The best mop ever mop head is a bit small bucket will leak a little mop will get stuck on spinner
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop system it's super easy to use . Spins water out more then any other mop I have ever used my floor was dry quick. I wish bucket had wheels And mop head was slightly bigger . I noticed the bucket drops water underneath but not a big concern mop tends to get stuck on spinner when removing it from bucket to the spinner
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: My last O-Cedar spin mop I bought lasted years and finally had to repurchase due to the mop handle breaking -- this one didn't even make it one year before the mop handle broke. Will not be purchasing again, especially since you can't just buy a new handle. I don't need a whole new bucket and head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is a SCAM, don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Positive reviews are probably people getting paid. This product is CRAP. Read the honest 1 star reviews there: - mop is super small and can't really scratch dirt from the floor, too soft - the bucket is a JOKE. The wring system leave the mop soaked wet and it's totally USELESS! I ended up squeezing it with my bare hands If there is a way to signal a product as scam on amazon, please use it
customer_reviews.author: alx

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product three times since getting it. So far, I really like it and I've already bought some extra mop heads for when I need to switch out. I agree with previous reviews in that the pedal is a little delicate and if used with too much force, could break; in fact, I almost broke it myself, thankfully that didn't happen. So just be aware that the product works great- it's a nice size, gets the floor clean, and has a really convenient centrifuge-esque spinner- but treat it with extra care, and it will last longer (as with anything).
customer_reviews.author: LCL

customer_reviews.title: Shame on O-Cedar's QC department
customer_reviews.text: 2nd set I have bought. The 1st set, the handle came apart (a nylon insert seared in 2) after I had it for about a year. I thought it was defective so I bought another last week. The telescoping handle will not stay extended (even after following the instructions repeatedly)! So now when I use it, the handle keeps retracting down to about 12-15 inches. I cannot even buy a replacement handle...they only sell everything as a set!! I think O-Cedar owes me an apology (and a new, non-defective, handle)
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Best mopping system ever!
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box because I had some doctors orders tell me to take it easy after a surgery. So I finally got to use it. I love it! I won’t go back to using the Swiffer Wet Jet. This mopping system gets my tile and vinyl floors clean the first time over and can get into the texture of these floors so much better! I even used it to clean my tubs instead of having to crawl in them to get all the sides and bottoms. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Denise J. Ford

customer_reviews.title: easy wring mop
customer_reviews.text: I gave this mop 4 stars because the handle is too short, I'm 5'2'' and I'm having to lean over more than I would like to so I can imagine others that might use it. but it works great, good quality doesn't feel like a cheap mop, love how well it wrings out so I can either have a wet mop or a dry mop, didn't notice any streaking on my floors after they dried, can easily move the mop bucket around as its not too heavy, don't like how easy the mop head moves around but I would still buy this again for sure, no strings or residue left behind from old mop
customer_reviews.author: P. Hope

customer_reviews.title: Mop of my dreams NO CONS
customer_reviews.text: Oh my freaking gosh. Mop or my dreams seriously works like a dream and spinning the water out is so fun. I was skeptical at first but it really gets all the water out . I love that you can throw the heads in the wash . I love that I can mop under the fridge without moving it . I even mop my baseboard with it . Its wonderful . And cleans so well my hardwood floors felt so good after no weird sticky feeling my other mop used to leave behind. When you're mopping it's so smooth it feels like you're polishing it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The bucket is fine; however, the mop is barely usable. The fibers in the mop head are sparse and short. Additionally, I am not a tall person and the handle on this mop is so short that I have to bend over to use it. Seems adequate for a small child. You can buy the bucket and a much better mop at you local box store or grocery store for much less. I should have done my homework on this as it is not returnable. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: debra t

customer_reviews.title: Best mop ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find a mop that is long-lasting, not too heavy and easy to use. This is a terrific find! The spin basket is great and works perfectly to get just the right amount of wetness on the mop...spin a little for more wetness, more for a damp mop. The microfiber mop fits into corners much easier than a regular mop because of the triangular design. I have hardwood floors and I don't want them to get too wet, so this is the perfect product for me.
customer_reviews.author: 8banana

customer_reviews.title: Technology is awesome
customer_reviews.text: For years I've dreaded having to wring out a dirty mop with my hands. Now with this bucket and mop, it's a sinch. I can clean the floors and still have a clean hand when it's all said and done. The other amazing thing to it is that the mop head is machine washable so that also makes life easier .
customer_reviews.author: NYAKSTAR RAPSTAR

customer_reviews.title: Easy Wringing
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have tile floors. Mop head seems to be a cotton/synthetic blend, no scrubber for heavy jobs. Extra pressure for small scuff marks. The spinner bucket is awesome, but can tilt a bit if not enough water. I can clean my floor in less time without straining my back or wetting my hands. Using hot water, the tiles dry quickly and without streaks. Mop head sometimes fall off, but easy to snap back on. Mop head can go in the washing machine. I really like this mop.
customer_reviews.author: Carlie

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done, save a lot of effort, but not perfectly clean
customer_reviews.text: A big life saver, have been try different brands before, this one is the best. Easy to wash the mop head and dry up in the same bin. At first use, the mop head get to wet to wipe the floor. But second time I spin more cycles and it become very dry. The rotation head is very easy to get around the corner. The only catch back is the material of the mop head, is kind of microfiber, so the large debris not easy to stick on it when I try to clean the hard floor. Hopefully the plastic step can hold strong for long time use. I will check back later.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Use daily
customer_reviews.text: Best spin mop. I have been through several since they first came out and have used other brands. This is the best of all, bucket is light weight and is easy to handle for a 80 year old lady to dump as well as the pump mechanism only wished the mechanism would last longer. My O Cedar spin mop is as important to me as my vehicle keys. I use mine daily several times a day. My dog is elderly and is proficient at wet accidents which need immediate attention. Thanks O CEDAR and Amazon
customer_reviews.author: wanda holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great for wood floors.
customer_reviews.text: Buy it now. Do not waste your time reading these reviews. Just buy this! Best mop and bucket I have ever found. Seriously, I have been cleaning floors for over 30 years. I don't have to touch the mop head or water ever again because of this great invention. I use it for my hardwood floors. Just a fee extra pumps with my foot and the mop head is barely damp. Perfect for wood.
customer_reviews.author: Pegs Armour

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea mopping a floor could be so much fun. I have two young dogs that love to be outside, rain or shine, so when they come inside all that great outdoors comes with them. My kitchen floor had gotten so bad with hair and mud I cringed every time I had to go in there. None of the mops I had did anything except push the dirt around. This spin mop is a game changer and a hoot to use. My kitchen floor looks great and is clean and I am willing to use it daily in the kitchen because it is so easy to use. Thank you to whoever came up with this idea!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tell it like it is

customer_reviews.title: So much better than some of the other spinning mops!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mop- which is a really weird thing to say for a person who hates cleaning. My biggest selling point is that unlike some of the other spinning mops- this one does NOT have a round head and spin around- so you can actually clean corners, baseboards, and along walls without having to either get on your hands and knees to scrub or scooting it along with your foot. It makes mopping easier and anything that makes cleaning easier is a win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Treat yourself. You won’t be sorry
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy watching TRADITIONS BY SEASON on YOUTUBE. Her name is Liz and she raved about this mop system. She has a very large home with hardwood floors and she made a video called Come Clean with me. I just had to see what all the fuss was about. Well she is so right. This mop spins out almost dry. Which is perfect for cleaning my hardwood floors. I am 64 and wish I knew about this mop years ago. Great product. Don’t be fooled by the cheaper imitations I have seen in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: susan reed

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Buddy of mine who does janitorial work on the side told me about this product. I was skeptical and was going to buy a commercial grade large mop and bucket. So glad I didn't! the wringer works exceptionally well and is fun to use. Mop handle could be a little longer and beefier; I'm 6'2". But I like the design and it is easy to get into corners and other tight spots. Due to the bucket size and shape, it is a little awkward to fill at the kitchen sink, but I managed. Never seen these before and glad my buddy recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis T.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: As far as I’m concerned, the O’Cedar spin mop is not worth the money I paid for it! Never had a chance to try it! They instruct you to hold the mop head with your feet to separate it from the handle in order to wash it. Good luck with that!!! The mop it would not separate from the frame, in fact the handle pulled off. Didn’t care at all for the microfiber mop head because it’s too skimpy. As someone else pointed out....in the process of moping the plastic frame could possibly scratch the wood floor. Never used the thing, but they don’t allow returns on that item. What a waste of money!😡
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: The Only Mop I Will Need
customer_reviews.text: I honestly just wanted a basic mop, and stumbled upon this gem while browsing selections. This thing is amazing! It is really light weight, but feels durable. It is very compact, folds up and extends to a good size. The bucket is durable, light, and ingenious. Whomever designed this mop deserves high praise. I don't think I can ever go to a normal mop and bucket again. I will gladly pay a few extra dollars for such great comfort. Thank you for making such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: kirby

product_meta.title: O-Cedar EasyWring Microfiber Spin Mop, Bucket Floor Cleaning System
product_meta.description: O-Cedar EasyWring Microfiber Spin Mop, Bucket Floor Cleaning System
feature_bullets: Exclusive bucket design has built-in wringer that allows for hands-free wringing
Deep-cleaning microfiber removes and absorbs tough dirt and grime
High-quality foot pedal designed to activate spin wringing, allowing the level of moisture to be controlled
Features Splash Guard to keep splash and spray inside bucket when wringing.Do not expose to excessive sunlight
Compatible with the EasyWring Mop Refill

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars29,580 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
